geneid.title: NCBI Entrez GeneID
geneid.description: NCBI Entrez GeneID of official nomenclature approved gene.
geneid.comment: An ENCODE gene (object) needs to have an Entrez GeneID and needs to be approved by (i.e. have an ID and gene symbol from) offical nomenclature such as HGNC, MGI, FlyBase, WormBase.

symbol.title: Gene symbol
symbol.description: Gene symbol approved by the official nomenclature.

synonyms.title: Synonyms
synonyms.description: Alternative symbols that have been used to refer to the gene.
synonyms.comment: The list of synonyms is maintained using information from NCBI Entrez. Synonyms not included in NCBI gene_info can be added but are not actively maintained.

items.title: Synonym
items.description: An alternative symbol/name referring to the gene.

dbxrefs.title: External identifiers
dbxrefs.comment: This list should have at least an ID from the official nomenclature. The list of other dbxrefs is maintained using information from NCBI Entrez. Identifiers not included in NCBI gene_info can be added but are not actively maintained.

items.title: External identifier
items.description: A unique identifier from external resource (e.g. HGNC, MGI, FlyBase, WormBase, ENSEMBL, MIM, RefSeq, UniProtKB, Vega, miRBase).
items.comment: Submit as database_name:id. See changelog for potential databases.
